headline: FIS Recognized Among Fast Company’s Best Workplaces for Innovators
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., September 09, 2025--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, announced today that it has once again been named to Fast Company's Best Workplaces for Innovators list. Recognized in the Large Companies (1,000+ employees) category, this marks the third time FIS has received this honor, underscoring the company's ongoing commitment to building a culture of innovation that unlocks financial technology across the money lifecycle.
